Title: Chapter II: Fist Like a Bullet
Writer: Alfred Gough (created by), Miles Millar (created by), Alfred Gough, Miles Millar
Actors: Daniel Wu, Orla Brady, Sarah Bolger, Aramis Knight
Plot: M.K. finds refuge in an unlikely and dangerous place, while Sunny's loyalty is tested when Quinn tries to force him to commit an unspeakable act.
